<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Navigation mapping for this section
  const pages = [
    { file: '00_index.qmd', title: 'Welcome' },
    { file: '01_creating_llm_accounts.qmd', title: 'A.1 AI Assistants' },
    { file: '02_how_to_get_help.qmd', title: 'A.2 How to Get Help' },
    { file: '03_installing_python.qmd', title: 'A.3 Install Python' },
    { file: '04_alternative_gitpod_setup.qmd', title: 'A.4 Gitpod Alternative' },
    { file: '05_installing_your_editor.qmd', title: 'A.5 Install Editor' },
    { file: '06_setting_up_git_and_github.qmd', title: 'A.6 Git & GitHub' },
    { file: '07_forking_and_cloning.qmd', title: 'A.7 Fork & Clone' },
    { file: '08_installing_and_testing_quarto.qmd', title: 'A.8 Install Quarto' }
  ];
  
  // Get current page from URL
  const currentPath = window.location.pathname;
  const currentFile = currentPath.split('/').pop().replace('.html', '.qmd');
  
  // Find current page index
  const currentIndex = pages.findIndex(page => page.file === currentFile);
  
  if (currentIndex !== -1) {
    // Add previous button
    if (currentIndex > 0) {
      const prevPage = pages[currentIndex - 1];
      const prevHtml = prevPage.file.replace('.qmd', '.html');
      document.getElementById('nav-prev').innerHTML = 
        `<a href="./${prevHtml}" class="nav-button prev">← ${prevPage.title}</a>`;
    }
    
    // Add next button
    if (currentIndex < pages.length - 1) {
      const nextPage = pages[currentIndex + 1];
      const nextHtml = nextPage.file.replace('.qmd', '.html');
      document.getElementById('nav-next').innerHTML = 
        `<a href="./${nextHtml}" class="nav-button next">${nextPage.title} →</a>`;
    }
    
    // Update breadcrumb current page
    document.querySelector('.breadcrumb-current').textContent = pages[currentIndex].title;
  }
});
</script>
